inclusion.criterion: Moderate to severe OSA (as defined by an apnea-hypopnea index [AHI] score greater than 15 events per hour)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Body mass index greater than 30 kg/m
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Type 2 Diabetes associated with either: (a) unstable anti-diabetic therapy; (b) Hemoglobin A1C levels > 7%; (c) Inability to perform home blood glucose monitoring (fingerstick checks).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status with hypoxia and O2 sats 70s on BipAp.
